definition: A stitch in lace making used to fill in open spaces with threads resembling a cobweb. SPIDER WEB; SPIDER'S WEB Spi"der web", or Spi"der's web". (Zo√∂l.)  The silken web which is formed by most kinds of spiders, particularly the web spun to entrap their prey. See Geometric spider, Triangle spider, under Geometric, and Triangle.
